article.title: Pragmatics Receives $99 Million Award to Provide Domestic Desktop Support to State Department
article.author: Katie Packard
article.text: Pragmatics Incorporated has been awarded a task order to provide support services for up to 37,000 desktops for the U.S. State Department Bureau of Information Resources Management and its domestic customer bureaus. The task order could be worth $99 million if all options are exercised. It was awarded under the Hybrid Information Technology Services for State contract.
